column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////Do not waste your time with this gimmick
column2: Mickey Mouse chain if you're in search of the real deal. Was put on hold 3 times only to reiterate why I was calling only to be met with rude service. They want your credit card in case of reservation no shows? Who do they think they are a 4 star Mechlin restaurant? I think I'd rate Olive Garden over this nonsense. Service was slow
column3: dumb and all of our pizzas came out flat and undercooked. Only thing you'll be walking away with from here is a night on the toilet thanks to the raw sausage and chewy dough. Overall bad pizza
column4: not high thick or cooked even after I sent it back after already waiting 40 minutes.
